showIcon.description: Gets or sets visibility of icon on error message.

animationShow.description: Gets or sets duration of show animation in milliseconds.

animationHide.description: Gets or sets duration of hide animation in milliseconds.

enableTargetErrorCss.description: Gets or sets ability to apply error css to target element.

alignment.description: Gets or sets location of error label relative to target element.

keepFocus.description: Gets or sets option to set focus back to editor when validation failed. Default value comes from corresponding member in $.ui.igValidator.defaults object, which is undefined.

onchange.description: Gets or sets triggering validation when value in editor was changed.

onblur.description: Gets or sets triggering validation when editor lost focus.

formSubmit.description: Gets or sets triggering validation when application called form.submit().

onsubmit.description: Gets or sets triggering validation when form gets onsubmit event.

bodyAsParent.description: Gets or sets parent/location of error message.

required.description: Gets or sets option to validate if value was entered (not empty text, selected item, etc.)

minLength.description: Gets or sets minimum length of text or minimum number of selected items.

maxLength.description: Gets or sets maximum length of text or maximum number of selected items.

min.description: Gets or sets validation for minimum number.

max.description: Gets or sets validation for maximum number.

regExp.description: Gets or sets regular expression which is used to validate value in text editor.

checkboxesName.description: Gets or sets option to use the name attribute of checkboxes in order to validate ranges.

theme.description: Gets or sets selector for css classes.

errorMessage.description: Gets or sets text for error-message which overrides all possible specific error-messages.
